archimate:BusinessActor.name: True Technology Partners
archimate:BusinessActor.documentation:
TRUE EXPERTISE, TRUE FLEXIBILITY< TRUE PARTNERSHIP
When you have technology partners who understand your environment, you can focus on the business True Technology Partners is a new specialist IT Services company with a lot of experience. And what we've learnt is that organisations can't do everything and so we don't try to. True Technology Partners concentrates on three areas of IT services - Architecture, BPM and Integration services. If we don't do it, we refer you to a trusted technology partner. This approach allows us to invest in our people ensuring that our consultants actually have the expertise that we claim. That's our philosophy.
https://www.truetechnologypartners.com.au/
Reach Us PO BOX A518, Sydney South, 1235, New South Wales, Australia
Call Us +612 9994 8014
Email Us info@truetechnologypartners.com.au
